description: This file defines a Java interface for database operations related to UtilityAccountEntity, using Spring Data JPA. It extends JpaRepository and declares a custom method to find utility accounts by provider name.

classes.name: UtilityAccountRepository
classes.description: A Spring Data JPA repository interface for UtilityAccountEntity providing basic CRUD operations and a custom find method by provider name.

methods.name: findByProviderName
methods.description: Finds an UtilityAccountEntity by the provider's name, returning an Optional.
